item.description:
WHERE: Portsmouth High School
WHEN: Tuesday 11 August - Event begins at 11:00.

Pro-socialist groups are meeting to assemble at 8:00AM

According to sources, "Organizing for America" is organizing the event's volunteers. There will be few tickets released to the general public. The White House selects "independent" voters to invite, congress people get tickets to give away on a limited basis, some public tickets will be available by lot on the website, etc.
item.name: Health Care Town Hall with President Obama
